FuncDef: The power off auto-power-on command powers on indicates that the specified board or subcard is automatically powered on.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the subcard to be powered on or powered off.
The value is the ID of the in-position subcard.

Indicates that the specified board or subcard is automatically powered on.
-

Specifies the slot ID of the board to be powered on or powered off.
The value is the slot number of the in-position board.

Examples: Warning:  This command may affect operation by wrong use, please carefully use it with HUAWEI engineer's direction. Are you sure to do this operation? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
During remote maintenance or remote board fault rectification, to power off a board and allow the board to be automatically powered on afterward, configure the auto-power-on parameter in the power off command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The slot ID of a CR5D00C2CF71,CR5D00E8GF73,CR5D00E8GF72subcard is displayed as 0 and 2 or 1 and 3. However, subcards in slots 2 and 3 cannot be powered on. If you attempt to power on a subcard in slot 2 or 3, the system prompts a message to instruct you to power on the subcard in slot 0 or 1 instead.
